settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage your app settings, preferences and accounts.

accounts.title: Account Settings
accounts.kitsu_password_info: Your password is not stored in the app, it is sent directly to Kitsu for authentication.

app.import_description: Failed to import settings from clipboard, make sure the copied data is valid JSON.
app.log_level_description: Enable logging of specific parts of the app. These logs are saved to %appdata$/Hayase/logs/main.log or ~/config/Hayase/logs/main.log.
app.app_device_info_description: Copy app and device debug info and capabilities, such as GPU information, GPU capabilities, version information and settings to clipboard.
app.log_output_description: Copy debug logs to clipboard. Once you enable a logging level you can use this to quickly copy the created logs to clipboard instead of navigating to the log file in directories.
app.open_ui_devtools_description: Open devtools for the UI process, this allows to inspect media playback information, rendering performance and more. DO NOT PASTE ANY CODE IN THERE, YOU'RE LIKELY BEING SCAMMED IF SOMEONE TELLS YOU TO!
app.hide_to_tray_description: Makes the app hide to tray instead of closing when you close the window. This is useful if you want to keep the torrent client open in the background to seed/leech.
